title: Minimalist Duplex Retreat Near Green Waterfront in Baluty
description: This elegant duplex in Lodz’s Baluty neighborhood offers 4 well-lit bedrooms, 3 modern bathrooms, and a generous 166 sqm space. Inspired by Scandinavian minimalism, the interior flows seamlessly between living, work, and rest zones—a calm, functional canvas ready for your creative vision. Elevator access and thoughtfully integrated built-in wardrobes blend practicality with understated aesthetics. Residents benefit from eco-friendly features such as a rainwater collection system and enjoy well-maintained common areas, heightening the sense of refinement throughout.
neighborhood_description: Situated in a dynamic, trendy zone of Baluty, the property is enveloped in green surroundings and moments from the peaceful waterfront. This district harmonizes urban convenience with recreational opportunities, and is recognized for its safe atmosphere and young, forward-thinking community. Excellent public transport and direct highway access ensure effortless connections across Lodz and beyond.
lifestyle_benefits: Steps from the waterfront for inspiration or relaxation
Trendy, energetic local scene and cafes
Quiet, safe neighborhood ideal for remote work or creative pursuits
target_buyer: Ideal for entrepreneurs, remote professionals or creative leaders seeking a peaceful, trend-conscious environment with pragmatic amenities and quick city connections.
market_positioning: This duplex stands out in Lodz’s market for modern executives wanting spacious, flexibility-oriented living with environmental sensibility in a vibrant, popular neighborhood.
